    • Field Detail

      • parent

        private java.lang.Object parent

      • extImages

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extImages
        A HashMap mapping file extensions to images. This is used to add preview-symbols for specific file extensions. The valueString should be a String representing any image filename located in /edge/assets/img/mimetypes/

      • openImageChooser

        protected java.io.File openImageChooser(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        opens a fileChooser object within the given stage object adds filter for common image formats.
        Parameters:
        stage - any stage instance (defaults to MainApplication Stage)
        Returns:
        a file when the user selects a file in the filechooser dialog. returns null if no file was selected.

      • openFileChooser

        protected java.io.File openFileChooser(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        opens a filechooser object within the given stage allows any file to be selected.
        Parameters:
        stage - any stage instance (defaults to MainApplication Stage)
        Returns:
        a file when the user selects a file in the filedialog, null if no file was selected.

      • openView

        protected void openView(java.lang.String view,
                        java.lang.Object controller)
        opens a given fxml file and attaches controller to it.
        Parameters:
        view - a string representing the .fxml filename (you have to omit the full path)
        controller - any controller object which should handle the view

      • openView

        protected void openView(java.lang.String view,
                        java.lang.Object controller,
                        javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        opens a view within the stage of an existing view
        Parameters:
        view - a string representing the .fxml filename (you have to omit the full path)
        controller - any controller object which should handle the view
        stage - any stage which will handle the view
